page.title: 17A Schoolchild of 1985.
page.content: A Schoolchild of 1985 at Stalyhill Junior School belongs to a fairly well off family, usually of 4 people. When at school, wears uniform, but at home wears jeans. Hair is short-current fashion. Wakes at 7a.m. eats cereals, boiled egg or bacon and egg. Has good choice of school dinner. Lessons includemaths, English, Science, Computers, and Football/Netball. There are clubs at lunchtime, Y.O.C., Chess, Gymnastics. In leisure time, attends cubs/brownies, goes birdwatching, reads, draws, uses computer, rides a B.M.X. Receives &1.50 pocket money each week. Spends holidays in Cornwall, Wales or Lakw District, or may camp abroad. Many families own caravans. Some own villas in Spain or Tenerife.
